name: Terms & Conditions
contents:
Introduction
By downloading, accessing, or using the ResQme application ("ResQme"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use ResQme. These Terms govern your use of ResQme, including all features, functionalities, and services provided through ResQme.

Use of ResQme
ResQme is designed to serve as a platform for victims of natural accidents to receive assistance and for search and rescue teams and volunteers to provide aid. By using ResQme, you agree to use it solely for its intended purpose and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

User Responsibilities
(a) You are solely responsible for the accuracy and completeness of the information you provide through ResQme, including your location and medical information.
(b) You agree not to misuse ResQme, including but not limited to, attempting to access data or systems not intended for you, interfering with the functioning of ResQme, or engaging in any activity that may damage, disable, or impair ResQme or its servers.
(c) You agree not to use ResQme for any unlawful, harmful, or inappropriate purposes, including but not limited to, harassment, spamming, or transmitting viruses or other malicious code.

Privacy
Your privacy is important to us. By using ResQme, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in our Privacy Policy.

Intellectual Property
ResQme, including all content, features, and functionalities, is owned by ResQme and its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You agree not to modify, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works based on ResQme without our prior written consent.

Limitation of Liability
(a) To the extent permitted by law, ResQme and its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, agents, and licensors shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of ResQme.
(b) In no event shall ResQme's total liability to you exceed the amount paid by you, if any, for accessing or using ResQme.

Indemnification
You agree to indemnify and hold harmless ResQme and its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, agents, and licensors from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of or in connection with your use of ResQme or any violation of these Terms.

Modifications to Terms
We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time without prior notice. Any changes to these Terms will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of ResQme after the posting of revised Terms constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

Governing Law
These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Germany. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Germany.

By using ResQme, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

name: Legal
contents:
ResQme is an application developed with the intention of providing assistance to victims of natural accidents and facilitating communication between those in need and search and rescue teams or volunteers. However, it is important to note that ResQme is currently not in active use or deployment.

The features and functionalities described for ResQme, including its potential to share location, medical information, and facilitate communication with rescue teams or volunteers, are conceptual and have not been implemented or made available to the public.

While efforts may have been made to develop ResQme and its associated functionalities, it is imperative to understand that its effectiveness and reliability have not been tested or verified in real-world scenarios. Therefore, users should refrain from relying on ResQme for emergency assistance or any other purpose until it is officially deployed, tested, and made available for public use.

Furthermore, the information provided about ResQme, including its features, functionalities, and potential use cases, is for informational purposes only and does not constitute a guarantee or promise of future availability or performance.

Users are encouraged to exercise caution and use alternative methods for seeking assistance or providing aid in emergency situations until ResQme is officially launched and declared operational.
